alert.note: Alert for Deuel; Grant; Roberts (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued February 21 at 1:58PM MST until February 23 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST WEDNESDAY... ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON WEDNESDAY TO NOON CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. For the Blizzard Warning, blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 13 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Roberts, Grant and Deuel Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until noon CST Wednesday. For the Blizzard Warning, from noon Wednesday to noon CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning and evening commutes this week. The dangerously cold wind chills as low as 35 below zero will cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
